105.name: Politics A
105.body: You have 20 krones on your money track.

106.name: Politics A
106.body: There are at least 12 room tiles (any color) on your hotel board, whether vacant or occupied.

107.name: Politics A
107.body: You have played at least 6 staff cards (of any type).

108.name: Politics A
108.body: Your Emperor track marker is on space 10 or higher.

109.name: Politics B
109.body: At least 2 floors in your hotel are fully occupied. These floors need not be adjacent.

110.name: Politics B
110.body: At least 6 groups of rooms in your hotel (any colors) are fully occupied. The groups need not be contiguous.

111.name: Politics B
111.body: All rooms of at least one color in your hotel are occupied.

112.name: Politics B
112.body: At least 2 columns in your hotel are fully occupied. These columns need not be adjacent.

113.name: Politics C
113.body: You have at least 3 red, at least 3 blue, and at least 3 yellow occupied rooms in your hotel.

114.name: Politics C
114.body: You have at least 4 red and at least 3 yellow occupied rooms in your hotel.

115.name: Politics C
115.body: You have at least 4 yellow and at least 3 blue occupied rooms in your hotel.

116.name: Politics C
116.body: You have at least 4 blue and at least 3 red occupied rooms in your hotel.
